item.title: 美元走强，中国将人民币定盘价下调至一月以来最低点
item.description: 由于美元反弹促使决策者略微放松了对人民币的控制，中国将人民币每日参考汇率下调至 1 月份以来的最低水平。【原文：China weakened its daily reference rate for the yuan to a level unseen since January, as the dollar’s rebound prompted policymakers to slightly ease their grip on the currency.】

item.title: 花旗银行考虑减少新加坡大厦的办公面积
item.description: 随着远程办公在新加坡的普及，花旗集团正在考虑减少其在新加坡的办公空间。【原文：Citigroup Inc. is considering reducing its office space in Singapore as remote working gains traction in the city-state.】

item.title: 印度卢比即将创下历史新低，顶级预测师称印度卢比牛市错了
item.description: 印度卢比的最高预测者与大多数人的预测背道而驰。根据丹斯克银行（Danske Bank A/S）的预测，印度卢比将在年底前创下新低，与七年来首次上涨的一致预测背道而驰。【原文：The Indian rupee’s top forecaster is going against the majority. The currency will test a fresh low by year-end, according to Danske Bank A/S, defying the consensus prediction for the first gain in seven years.】

item.title: 高速交易商大举做空印度市场波动性
item.description: 在这个据称为简街集团赚取 10 亿美元而吸引了全球金融界关注的市场中，许多交易公司正在采用一种相对简单的策略：做空波动性。【原文：In a market that’s captured the attention of global finance for allegedly making $1 billion for Jane Street Group, many trading firms are employing a relatively simple strategy: short volatility.】

item.title: 香港散户交易员为反弹逆转下大ETF赌注
item.description: 香港的散户投资者正在加大杠杆赌注，认为本地股票飙升的势头可能很快就会瓦解。【原文：Hong Kong’s retail investors are ramping up leveraged wagers that a surge in local equities may soon unravel.】

item.title: 保险商 Bowhead 在扩大规模后的首次公开募股中融资 1.28 亿美元
item.description: 专业财险公司 Bowhead Specialty Holdings Inc.在美国首次公开募股中筹集了 1.28 亿美元，此前该公司扩大了股票销售规模，股票定价高于市场范围。【原文：Specialty property and casualty insurer Bowhead Specialty Holdings Inc. raised $128 million in a US initial public offering after increasing the size of the stock sale and pricing the shares above a marketed range.】

item.title: 地缘政治风险上升，加拿大养老金的中国风险敞口降至 5
item.description: 加拿大养老金计划投资委员会（Canada Pension Plan Investment Board）对人民币的投资在短短两年内减少了一半，原因是该基金管理公司因风险较高而撤出了对世界第二大经济体的投资。【原文：Canada Pension Plan Investment Board’s exposure to investments in yuan has fallen by half in just two years, as the money manager pulls back in the world’s second-largest economy because of higher risks.】

item.title: 美联储前景鹰派，石油连续第四个交易日延续跌势
item.description: 周三，石油收于三个月来的最低水平，跌幅扩大，原因是有迹象表明美联储可能在更长时间内维持较高利率，这可能会拖累能源需求。【原文：Oil extended losses after closing at the lowest level in three months on Wednesday on signs the Federal Reserve may hold interest rates higher for longer, which could weigh on energy demand.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好。英伟达（Nvidia）再次给出看涨的销售预测。高盛首席执行官对美联储今年降息持怀疑态度。英国选民即将投票。以下是市场动态。【原文：Good morning. Nvidia gives another bullish sales forecast. Goldman Sachs’ CEO is skeptical about Fed rate cuts this year. And UK voters are headed to the polls. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Isabelle Lee】

item.title: 人民币疲软令港股吸引力超过中国股市
item.description: 自 2011 年以来，在内地交易的中国股票落后于香港同类股票的幅度最大，由于人民币疲软削弱了前者的前景，这种表现可能会持续下去。【原文：Chinese stocks traded on the mainland are lagging their Hong Kong peers by the most since 2011, an underperformance that’s likely to endure as a weak yuan saps the former’s outlook.】

item.title: 湖畔大学的财务主管远眺迫在眉睫的债务高山
item.description: 本周在意大利阿尔卑斯山阴影下举行会议的全球财政首脑们可能不会过多地关注前景中最大的一座山：他们自己的债务。【原文：Global finance chiefs meeting in the shadow of the Italian alps this week probably won’t look too hard at one of the biggest mountains in the foreground: their own debt.】

item.title: 中国违约标志着 50 亿美元债券担保额度受限
item.description: 中国房地产开发商的一连串违约事件凸显了国家支持的信贷支持计划的局限性，该计划旨在提振人们对中国饱受打击的房地产行业的信心。【原文：A string of defaults by Chinese property developers has highlighted the limits of a state-backed credit-support program that was meant to boost confidence in the country’s battered property sector.】

item.title: 美元坚挺，美国收益率上升，英伟达提振科技：市场综述
item.description: 亚洲股市周四开盘涨跌不一，因英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.由于美国收益率上升，美元强势指数触及一周高点。【原文：Asian equities were set for a mixed open Thursday as results for Nvidia Corp. supported tech stocks in late trading. An index of dollar strength touched a one-week high as US yields rose.】

item.title: 俄罗斯承诺弥补四月份原油生产过剩
item.description: 俄罗斯能源部周四表示，俄罗斯四月份的原油产量超出了其承诺，不久将向欧佩克及其盟国提交一份弥补额外产量的计划。【原文：Russia exceeded its crude production commitment for April and will soon present OPEC and its allies with a plan to make up for the extra output, the country’s Energy Ministry said Thursday.】

item.title: 必和必拓有一周时间说服英格集团其南非计划可行
item.description: 必和必拓集团刚刚赢得了额外一周的时间来说服英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）同意其价值 490 亿美元的收购计划。但这家全球最大的矿商仍必须解决交易中最棘手的障碍：如何处理南非问题？【原文：BHP Group just won an extra week to convince Anglo American Plc on its $49 billion takeover plan. But the world’s biggest miner still must resolve the deal’s most intractable obstacle: What to do about South Africa?】

item.description: 嘉信理财公司（Charles Schwab Corp.【原文：Charles Schwab Corp. is planning to roll out an alternative investments platform in phases for individual investors this year.】

item.description: 据知情人士透露，出版商西蒙-舒斯特公司（Simon & Schuster Inc.【原文：Publisher Simon & Schuster Inc. is seeking a 90-day extension to file its audited financial results for 2023 and for the first quarter of 2024, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 约翰-赫斯在投票前亲自致电投资者支持雪佛龙交易
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，以其家族姓氏命名的石油公司的老板约翰-赫斯（John Hess）正在与股东们直接对话，为确保雪佛龙公司（Chevron Corp.）以 530 亿美元收购该公司获得足够的支持做最后的努力。【原文：John Hess, the boss of the oil company that bears his family name, is talking to directly with shareholders in a last-ditch effort to ensure enough support for a $53 billion takeover by Chevron Corp., according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 监管机构 Finra 称，华尔街的五天办公规定不是我们的错
item.description: 华尔街的老板们警告员工，监管变化即将终结他们在家工作的日子，而负责监管的监管机构则直言不讳：不要再责怪我们了。【原文：As Wall Street bosses warn employees that regulatory changes are about to end their days of working from home, the watchdog in charge has a blunt message: Stop blaming us.】

item.title: 华尔街胖手指问题简史
item.description: 2022 年，花旗集团的一名交易员在一次最简单的失误后给欧洲股市造成了巨大破坏：这名员工在银行交易系统中输入了他们想要购买的股票的价值。这一错误在五分钟内引发了从法国到挪威的欧洲股市大跌，价值 14 亿美元的股票被错误卖出。【原文：A single Citigroup Inc. trader caused havoc in European stocks in 2022 after the simplest of blunders: The staffer entered the value of stocks they wanted to buy into the wrong field of the bank’s trading system. The mistake triggered a five-minute selloff in European stocks from France to Norway, with $1.4 billion worth of equities sold in error.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会的热点问题有可能削弱对以太-ETF 的需求
item.description: 加密货币市场的许多人认为，对拟议中的现货以太币交易所交易基金的一些申请所做的一项关键改动将有利于以太坊区块链，但却会使未来的 ETF 产品本身处于不利地位。【原文：Many in the crypto market believe that a key change made to some applications for proposed spot-Ether exchange traded funds will be good for the Ethereum blockchain, while putting the prospective ETF products themselves at a disadvantage.】

item.title: 阿根廷经济在米莱伊削减开支的影响下继续下滑
item.description: 阿根廷总统哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）继续推行紧缩政策以遏制通货膨胀，因此阿根廷 3 月份的月度经济活动延续了下滑趋势。【原文：Argentina’s monthly economic activity extended a downturn in March as President Javier Milei pressed on with his austerity drive to put an end to inflation.】

item.title: 高盛现在认为美国债务成本比率已升至危险区域
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.）周三更新了其对美国长期财政前景的预测，新预测认为债务可持续性的一个关键指标将达到历史极端水平。【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. updated its longer-term US fiscal outlook Wednesday, with its new projections seeing a key metric of debt sustainability head to historically extreme levels.】

item.title: 法新社报道：马克龙希望通过福利改革节约 39 亿美元
item.description: 据法新社报道，法国总统埃马纽埃尔-马克龙（Emmanuel Macron）政府的目标是通过计划中的失业保险改革节省 36 亿欧元（约合 39 亿美元）。【原文：French President Emmanuel Macron’s government is targeting savings of €3.6 billion ($3.9 billion) from his planned reforms to unemployment insurance, Agence France-Presse reported.】

item.title: 少数 "美联储官员发出信号：他们本可以支持保持资产负债表缩表速度
item.description: "一些 "美联储决策者表示，他们本可以支持央行以目前的速度或比三周前宣布的更高的限额继续放松资产负债表。【原文：“A few” Federal Reserve policymakers said they could have supported continuing the central bank’s balance-sheet unwind at the current pace or at a higher limit than what was announced three weeks ago.】

item.title: 高盛首席执行官所罗门称今年 "零 "降息
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.首席执行官大卫-所罗门（David Solomon）表示，他目前预计美联储今年不会降息，因为政府支出已证明经济更具韧性。【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. Chief Executive Officer David Solomon said he currently expects that the Federal Reserve won’t cut interest rates this year, amid an economy that’s proved more resilient thanks to government spending.】

item.title: 巴克莱银行聘请美国银行的大卫-金（David King）担任全球技术管理与市场营销主管
